entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Bay Roberts
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:50 PM NDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Freezing drizzle. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries or drizzle early this evening. Freezing drizzle or flurries beginning this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Freezing drizzle. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Freezing drizzle or flurries changing to flurries or a few rain showers near noon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 1. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: Flurries. High zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Monday 27 March 2023
